name: Moredle
description:
Moredle

Put your vocabulary skills to the test with Moredle, the unique take on the popular Wordle. Unlike traditional Wordle which limits you to 5-letter words, Moredle lets you guess words of any length, giving you the opportunity to truly test your linguistic abilities with the increased difficulty of not knowing the length of the unknown word.

Two Play Modes to Choose From
  • Infinite mode:  hone your word-guessing skills with unlimited games and helpful statistics for improving and analyzing your games.
  • Daily mode: compete against other Moredle players on the daily resetting leaderboard. Each day, a new word is generated, and it's up to you to make the fewest number of attempts to guess it to claim your spot at the top.

Play Moredle now and see how many words you can conquer. With endless play options and daily challenges, there's always a new way to test your skills.

How To Play Web (Recommended):
  1. Scroll up to the game
  2. Click Play
Windows:
  1. Download the attached .zip file labeled 'Moredle Windows'
  2. unzip the file using your favorite unzipping utility
  3. open the resulting folder (do not change the location of anything in the folder)
  4. run the .exe file by double clicking on it
Mac:
  1. Download the attached .zip file labeled 'Moredle Mac'
  2. unzip the file by double clicking on it
  3. run the .app file by double clicking on it
  4. (OPTIONAL) if it displays a popup and doesnt open the app, right click on the .app file and click open. then when the popup appears, click open again
